name: Class Diagram
description: Shows the main classes/modules involved in registering and configuring the Read Files Node.

name: Component Diagram
description: Outlines the high-level components and how the read_files module integrates with the Drawflow editor.
mermaid_code:
```mermaid
flowchart LR
  subgraph Module
    A[read_files.js]
  end

  subgraph Editor
    B[Drawflow editor]
    C[Node registry]
  end

  subgraph NodeTypeDefinition
    D[HTML template]
    E[onCreate logic]
  end

  A --> B
  B --> C
  C --> D
  C --> E
```

name: Sequence Diagram
description: Describes the runtime interaction when the application imports and initializes the Read Files Node.
mermaid_code:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
Application ->> ReadFilesModule: import registerReadFiles
Application ->> ReadFilesModule: call registerReadFiles
ReadFilesModule ->> Editor: registerNode read_files
Editor -->> Module: store html and onCreate
User ->> Editor: add node of type read_files
Editor ->> onCreate: invoke with new node
onCreate ->> Form: render HTML
Form ->> NodeData: populate default config
```

name: Activity Diagram
description: Models the user input flow: rendering the form, handling edits, and updating the node configuration.
mermaid_code:
```mermaid
flowchart TD
  Start --> RenderForm
  RenderForm --> PopulateDefaults
  PopulateDefaults --> AwaitUserInput

  AwaitUserInput --> UserEntersPath
  UserEntersPath --> UpdateConfigPath

  AwaitUserInput --> UserEntersKey
  UserEntersKey --> UpdateConfigKey

  UpdateConfigPath --> PersistConfig
  UpdateConfigKey --> PersistConfig
  PersistConfig --> End
```
